src:
Sudah Dipecat, Simon McMenemy Masih Menangani Timnas Indonesia Lawan Malaysia?
06 Nov 2019, 17:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Teka-teki mengenai masa depan Simon McMenemy di kursi pelatih Timnas Indonesia terjawab. PSSI memastikan memberhentikan arsitek asal Skotlandia itu.
"Rapat Komite Eksekutif (Exco) PSSI memutuskan mengganti Simon," ujar Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
"Namun kapan Simon akan berhenti total, tentunya ada tata cara atau prosedur yang harus kamu lalui," katanya menambahkan.
Untuk pengganti Simon, pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule ini mengatakan, PSSI tengah menggodok sejumlah calon. Untuk namanya, akan diumumkan dalam waktu dekat.
"Mohon bersabar meskipun Simon sudah kami ganti, tapi kami menunggu administrasi yang harus dilalui," tuturnya.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Already Fired, Simon McMenemy Still Handling Indonesian National Team Against Malaysia?
Nov 6 2019, 17:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The puzzle about the future of Simon McMenemy in the Indonesian national team coach seat was answered. PSSI made sure to dismiss the Scottish architect.
"PSSI Executive Committee (Exco) Meeting decided to replace Simon," said PSSI General Chairman (Ketum), Mochamad Iriawan at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
"But when Simon will stop completely, of course there are procedures or procedures that you must go through," he added.
To replace Simon's, the man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule said, PSSI was in the process of preparing a number of candidates. As for the name, it will be announced in the near future.
"Please be patient even though Simon has changed us, but we are waiting for the administration to go through," he said.

Read the next page, Bolaneters
